publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3630 Jackie Baillie: Walk to the Rock—That the Parliament welcomes the plans of the Dumbarton Football Club’s Sons Supporters Trust to do a sponsored walk for charity on Saturday 25 April 2009; notes that the trust plans to walk from Loch Lomond shores to the Strathclyde Homes Stadium on the day of the home game against Forfar Athletic Football Club; welcomes the initiative shown by the trust in organising a family-friendly fundraising event that not only raises money for charity but promotes an active and healthy alternative to travelling to the game by car; further notes that the Sons Youth Development Initiative and St Vincent’s Hospice, Renfrewshire, will benefit from the proceeds; congratulates everyone involved in the organisation of the event, and wishes them every success in their fund-raising on the day.

S3M-3630 Jackie Baillie: Walk to the Rock—That the Parliament welcomes the plans of the Dumbarton Football Club’s Sons Supporters Trust to do a sponsored walk for charity on Saturday 25 April 2009; notes that the trust plans to walk from Loch Lomond shores to the Strathclyde Homes Stadium on the day of the home game against Forfar Athletic Football Club; welcomes the initiative shown by the trust in organising a family-friendly fundraising event that not only raises money for charity but promotes an active and healthy alternative to travelling to the game by car; further notes that the Sons Youth Development Initiative and St Vincent’s Hospice, Renfrewshire, will benefit from the proceeds; congratulates everyone involved in the organisation of the event, and wishes them every success in their fund-raising on the day.

S3M-3630 Walk to the Rock (lodged on 5 March 2009) Sarah Boyack*, Jamie Hepburn*, Mary Mulligan*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bob Doris*, Elaine Murray*, Helen Eadie*, Kenneth Gibson*, Des McNulty*, Sandra White*, Claire Baker*, Bill Kidd*, Trish Godman*, James Kelly*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3630 Walk to the Rock (lodged on 5 March 2009) George Foulkes*, John Park*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-3630 Walk to the Rock (lodged on 5 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*
